title: The Perfect Guy
description: A fugitive steals millions of dollars by conning numerous women and businesses over 25 years. Will law enforcement finally be able to catch him? Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 6, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
